courseSpec.title: Python Programming for Complete Beginners
courseSpec.audience: Anyone with no prior programming experience
courseSpec.goal: Learn Python fundamentals and write simple programs
courseSpec.teachingStyle: Patient, step-by-step explanations with lots of practice

lessonPlan.lessonObjective: Understand what variables are and how to use different data types
teachingFlow: Explain what a variable is using real-world analogies
Show how to create a variable in Python
Demonstrate different data types with examples
exampleSuggestions: Storing a name in a variable
Storing age and calculating birth year
commonMisunderstandings: Variables are not 'boxes' but labels pointing to values
You can change what a variable points to

constraints.toneOverride: very friendly and encouraging, like talking to a friend
